descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ff0000][b][youtube]oi6glpqQPmc[/youtube]
About The Mod:[/b] [/color][/size]

The Dark Brotherhood Continued mod will try and pick up were the generic Skyrim left off introducing new NPCs, items, and a bundle of new quests (Final Version will have 12) 

1 main quest
1 side quest
5 new NPCs
Some Fully voiced Dialogue
1 new spell  
1 new armor set (Shadowscale Armor)
New Item (Poison Apples)

To start head into the Dawnstar sanctuary and speak to Neezara he should be somewhere around the living area.  
And to start side quest head down to the college of Winterhold and speak to a character who isn't usually there.  


[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Installation:[/size][/color][/b]

Just drag the files into your Steam\Steamapps\Skyrim\Data file and everything should work.

Note if you have any trouble please leave a post.




[color=#ff0000][size=6]Story:

[/size][/color]Months after the events of the DB quest line  during Skyrim Neezara (Veezaras brother) who had been thought to be dead by his brother returns to the Dark Brotherhood with a incentive to find Veezara though failing this mission Neezara takes over the sanctuary to try and bring the Brotherhood back to it's former glory.

[b][color=#ff0000]Scripting:[/color][/b]
[size=3]This mod is in need of someone who has some knowledge of basic scripting in the creation kit. Now I can of course do some things myself, though development on this mod would speed up with help of a script-er. 

[/size][size=6]If you would like to help me with scripting then.....

[/size]A. Leave a post here.

B. Email me at Antwhatever@gmail.com


[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Compatibility: 
[/size]
[/color][/b]
Should work with most mods.

Any issues please leave a post about it and i'll try and sort it.


[color=#ff0000][b][size=6]Voice Acting:[/size][/b] 
[/color] 
Currently were okay on voice acting having all the roles filled for the characters. Though were not even close to the point in which we'll no longer need voice acting. So if you would like a role in this mod then..

A. Email me at Antwhatever@gmail.com
B. Leave a post asking to voice a role.


Myself (Anthony Conti)
Anita King
Susan Aceto 
Gino Alanslo
 



[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Requirements:
 [/size][/color][/b]
None (At this Point)


[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Frequent Q&A 

[/size][/color][/b]Q - "I can't speak too Neezara, what do I do?"

A - Reload your game this is a common bug with Skyrim.

 

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Upcoming Update:

[/size][/color][/b] Melven voice acted.

A Jesters Request quest added

Complete revamp of the sanctuary. 




[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Change Log: (As of PA v2)[/size][/color][/b]

*Fixed a bug were talking too Neezara doesn't work.
*Finished voice files for Neezara.
*Added Shadowscale Armor. 
*Added Poison Apples. 



[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Change Log: (As of B v1)
[/size][/color][/b]
* Added voice acting for No-Blood-Tail.
* Under New Manigment quest finished.
*Bug fixes.
author: Anthony Conti
